header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_bc30917.182834c045b127e020602e217ba7c4b437df1a7d.zh-cn is different with handoff file name: bc30917.182834c045b127e020602e217ba7c4b437df1a7d.zh-cn.

trans-unit.source: Class '<classname>' must declare a 'Sub New' because the '<constructorname>' in its base class '<baseclassname>' is marked obsolete | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 类的<classname>必须声明一个 Sub New，因为<constructorname>在其基本类<baseclassname>标记为已过时 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Class '<classname>' must declare a 'Sub New' because the '<constructorname>' in its base class '<baseclassname>' is marked obsolete
trans-unit.target: 类的<classname>必须声明一个 Sub New，因为<constructorname>在其基本类<baseclassname>标记为已过时

trans-unit.source: A class declaration does not include a constructor, and the base class constructor is marked with the <xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute> attribute and the directive to treat it as an error.
trans-unit.target: 类声明中不包括一个构造函数，并且基类构造函数标有<xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute>特性，指令会将其视为错误。</xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When a derived class does not declare a constructor, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] attempts to generate an implicit parameterless constructor that calls `MyBase.New()`.
trans-unit.target: 在派生的类没有声明构造函数，[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]尝试生成一个隐式的无参数构造函数来调用`MyBase.New()`。

trans-unit.source: If there is no accessible constructor in the base class that can be called without arguments, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] cannot generate an implicit constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有可访问的构造函数可以调用不带参数，基类中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]无法生成隐式构造函数。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the required constructor is marked with the <xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute> attribute, so [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] cannot call it.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，需要的构造函数标有<xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute>属性，因此[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]不能调用它。</xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can mark any programming element as being no longer in use by applying <xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute> to it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将标记为不再使用通过将应用<xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute>于它。</xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute>所有编程元素

trans-unit.source: If you do this, you can set the attribute's <xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute.IsError%2A> property to either `True` or `False`.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行此操作，则可以设置该属性的<xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute.IsError%2A>属性设置为任何一个`True`或`False`。</xref:System.ObsoleteAttribute.IsError%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set it to `True`, the compiler treats an attempt to use the element as an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 `True`，则编译器将尝试使用该元素的操作视为错误。

trans-unit.source: If you set it to `False`, or let it default to `False`, the compiler issues a warning if there is an attempt to use the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 `False`，或将其默认为 `False`，则编译器会在有操作尝试使用该元素时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Use `Sub New` to declare a constructor in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `Sub New` 在派生类中声明一个构造函数。

trans-unit.source: [NOT IN BUILD: Attributes Used in Visual Basic](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/22231318-8a40-49af-9245-e0aab723563b)
trans-unit.target: [在 Visual Basic 中使用不在生成中︰ 属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/22231318-8a40-49af-9245-e0aab723563b)
[不在生成中︰ 应用程序的属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2b1703ed-4437-49b3-bc0b-568094324f47)
